Name: Shawarma spiced chicken pita w yoghurt
Steps: combine cumin, coriander, paprika, cayenne, cinnamon, 2tbsp oil, 3/4 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper in large bowl. Add chicken and toss to coat.
Spread chicken on a rimmed baking sheet and roast until chicken is done
wrap pitas in foil and warm in oven for last 5 minutes of chicken
mix yoghurt, tahini, garlic, lemon zest, lEmon juice(2tbsp), 1/2tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper until incorporated
Fold in 2 tbsp dill and 2 tbsp mint
Toss cucumber, lettuce, tomatoes, onion, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp oil, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper in medium bowl
Notes: 2020/04/02, did wings and drumsticks with chichen tenders. Didn't have paprika or coriander. Yoghurt was too spicy and not sure if I tasted the dill. But it was a fun dish
